stimulusHtml: Which of the following could have caused the decrease in the real interest rate?

features.html: When Stephanie took out a one-year fixed-rate loan, she expected to pay a real interest rate of 3 percent. At the end of the year, the real interest rate had fallen to 2 percent.

choicesHtml: There was an increase in the nominal interest rate.
There was a decrease in the nominal interest rate.
There was a decrease in the money supply.
The actual inflation rate was greater than the expected inflation rate.
The actual inflation rate was less than the expected inflation rate.
